titleStmt.title: Proposals for the incouragement and promoting of religion and learning in the foreign plantations and to induce such of the clergy of this kingdom, as are persons of sobriety and abilities, to accept of a mission into those parts.
titleStmt.author: Bray, Thomas, 1658-1730.
Lawrence, Thomas, Sir, b. ca. 1645. Present state of the Protestant religion in Mary-land.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Bray. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
"The present state of the Protestant religion in Mary-land" (p. 3-4) is written by Thomas Lawrence. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in the John Carter Brown Library.
